decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 3 - The side roof dormer hereby approved shall be fitted with obscure glazing and windows shall be non-opening unless the parts of the window which can be opened are more than 1.7m above the finished floor level. The windows to the side dormer shall not be repaired or replaced with windows other than this.
description: Erection of a side roof dormer and change of roof tile to Jutland slate black from red clay plain roof tile approved under 01091/160/P4.
